metadata.title: CVE-2016-2421 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Setup Wizard in Android 5.1.x before 5.1.1 and 6.x before 2016-04-01 allowsphysically proximate attackers to bypass the Factory Reset Protectionprotection mechanism and delete data via unspecified vectors, aka internalbug 26154410.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
